code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
  [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> OFF
  %% 시작 경로
  OFF --> WARMUP: START(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) + MODE=WARM_UP
  OFF --> INIT: START(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  INIT --> PRECOOL: init_seconds elapsed
  PRECOOL --> RUN: T5 <= TSP - precool_band
  %% READY 표출 (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
  INIT --> READY: ready flag true
  PRECOOL --> READY: ready flag true
  RUN --> READY: ready flag true
  READY --> RUN: ready flag cleared
  %% 보류/재개
  RUN --> HOLD: HOLD(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  READY --> HOLD: HOLD(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  HOLD --> RUN: RESUME(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  %% 정지/전원 OFF
  any --> OFF: STOP(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic) or OFF(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  WARMUP --> OFF: warm reached
  %% 안전 전이
  state SAFE_SHUTDOWN
  INIT --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  PRECOOL --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  RUN --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  READY --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  HOLD --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  WARMUP --> SAFE_SHUTDOWN: Safety
  SAFE_SHUTDOWN --> OFF: RESET(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)=ACK_ALARM
